I love this game! The plot and lore behind the game is genius! Most of the puzzles weren't that hard and easily solvable. Considering the graphics are from 2007, it still looks good. After all the years the game still plays and functions pretty well. I give Portal a 10/10!
相比谜题，剧情更加值得思考
think with portals and shot for the cake. GLaDOS loves you <3
A good puzzle game. Would recommend portal 2 over this as the co-op makes it much more exciting.
Refasil, muy corto pero alta experiencia

Portal is a pretty chill game. It is a puzzle solving game that makes you use portals to your advantage. It only has about 10 hours of gameplay but I had a lot of fun in those 10 hours. It really does test your puzzle solving skills. Overall a pretty good game to play after work/school.
Отличная игра, она хороша тем что крайне короткая, лёгкая и на пару вечеров затянет.Советую к покупке
One of those games everyone must play
Es muy corto, pero la experiencia vale la pena
Very short, but really good. It hasn't aged a day.
A classic that everyone should play.

There isn't even enough words to express how amazing this game is so I'm just going to say play it, if for some  godforsaken reason you haven't already

The game is so cheap and it is the best money you will ever spend in your entire life

Ett smart pusselspel som är svårt att sluta spela, från att vara lätt ökar svårigheten i lagom takt, inte alltför stressigt utan bara en väldigt tillfredsställande spel upplevelse, Portal 2 är även ännu bättre på story och sköna miljöer tycker dock att man ska spela första  Portal för att inte missa ett av de bästa pusselspelen som jag känner till.
Great game even over 10 years later, Portal 2 will always be master class but this is the puzzle game for people who don't like puzzle games.
Très bon jeu, je vous conseil quand même le portal 2 qui est beaucoup plus complet sur celui ci qui peut être fini en quelques heures a peine.
